original_text: Is there anyone like me? If there is, he should say so! He must tell me why he thinks he is so great. Long ago I made my people become a nation. Let him say what he has done since then! Let him tell us what will happen in future years! Is there anyone like me? If there is, he should say so!
korean_text: 내가 영원한 백성을 세운 이후로 나처럼 외치며 알리며 나에게 설명할 자가 누구냐 있거든 될 일과 장차 올 일을 그들에게 알릴지어다

sentences.original_text: If there is, he should say so!
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 있다면, 그렇다고 말해야 할 것이다!

sentences.original_text: He must tell me why he thinks he is so great.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신이 왜 그렇게 위대하다고 생각하는지 말해야 한다.

sentences.original_text: Long ago I made my people become a nation.
sentences.korean_translation: 오래전에 나는 내 백성을 한 민족이 되게 했다.

sentences.original_text: Let him say what he has done since then!
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 이후로 그가 무엇을 했는지 말하게 하라!

sentences.original_text: Let him tell us what will happen in future years!
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 미래에 일어날 일들을 우리에게 말하게 하라!

sentences.original_text: If there is, he should say so!
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 있다면, 그렇다고 말해야 할 것이다!
